27 // dummy element factory used for arrays which traits don't need element factory
28 struct DummyElementFactory
29 {};
30 
31 // helper traits to choose proper element factory
32 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
33 struct ElementFactoryTraits
34 {
35  using type = DummyElementFactory;
36 };
37 
38 // specialization for object array traits which has info about the real element factory
39 template <typename T, typename ELEMENT_FACTORY>
40 struct ElementFactoryTraits<ObjectArrayTraits<T, ELEMENT_FACTORY>>
41 {
42  using type = ELEMENT_FACTORY;
43 };
44 
45 // using typedef to simplify accessing the element factory type
46 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
47 using ElementFactory = typename ElementFactoryTraits<ARRAY_TRAITS>::type;
48 
49 // helper function to hide noncompilable code in a "dead" branch
50 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS, typename std::enable_if<ARRAY_TRAITS::IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT, int>::type = 0>
51 size_t arrayTraitsConstBitSizeOf(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits)
52 {
53  return arrayTraits.bitSizeOf();
54 }
55 
56 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS, typename std::enable_if<!ARRAY_TRAITS::IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT, int>::type = 0>
57 size_t arrayTraitsConstBitSizeOf(const ARRAY_TRAITS&)
58 {
59  return 0; // never comes here, specialization needed only for proper compilation
60 }
61 
62 // helper function to call read on array traits which need element factory (ObjectArrayTraits)
63 template <typename RAW_ARRAY, typename ARRAY_TRAITS, typename ELEMENT_FACTORY>
64 void arrayTraitsRead(RAW_ARRAY& rawArray, const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits,
65  const ELEMENT_FACTORY& elementFactory, BitStreamReader& in, size_t index)
66 {
67  arrayTraits.read(elementFactory, rawArray, in, index);
68 }
69 
70 // overload for DummyElementFactory which is used for array traits which don't need element factory
71 template <typename RAW_ARRAY, typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
72 void arrayTraitsRead(RAW_ARRAY& rawArray, const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, const detail::DummyElementFactory&,
73  BitStreamReader& in, size_t)
74 {
75  rawArray.push_back(arrayTraits.read(in));
76 }
77 
78 // overload for array traits which are based on allocator
79 template <typename RAW_ARRAY, template <template <typename> class> class ARRAY_TRAITS,
80  template <typename> class ALLOC>
81 void arrayTraitsRead(RAW_ARRAY& rawArray, const ARRAY_TRAITS<ALLOC>& arrayTraits,
82  const detail::DummyElementFactory&, BitStreamReader& in, size_t)
83 {
84  rawArray.push_back(arrayTraits.read(in, rawArray.get_allocator()));
85 }
86 
87 // helper function to call read on packed array traits which need element factory (i.e. objects)
88 template <typename RAW_ARRAY, typename PACKED_ARRAY_TRAITS, typename ELEMENT_FACTORY,
89  typename PACKED_CONTEXT_NODE>
90 void packedArrayTraitsRead(RAW_ARRAY& rawArray, const PACKED_ARRAY_TRAITS& packedArrayTraits,
91  const ELEMENT_FACTORY& elementFactory, PACKED_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode,
92  BitStreamReader& in, size_t index)
93 {
94  packedArrayTraits.read(contextNode, elementFactory, rawArray, in, index);
95 }
96 
97 // overload for DummyElementFactory which is used for array traits which don't need element factory
98 template <typename RAW_ARRAY, typename PACKED_ARRAY_TRAITS, typename PACKED_CONTEXT_NODE>
99 void packedArrayTraitsRead(RAW_ARRAY& rawArray, const PACKED_ARRAY_TRAITS& packedArrayTraits,
100  const detail::DummyElementFactory&, PACKED_CONTEXT_NODE& contextNode, BitStreamReader& in, size_t)
101 {
102  rawArray.push_back(packedArrayTraits.read(contextNode, in));
103 }

105 // dummy offset initializer used for arrays which don't need to initialize offsets
106 struct DummyOffsetInitializer
107 {};
108 
109 // helper function to call initializeOffset on an offset initializer
110 template <typename OFFSET_INITIALIZER>
111 void initializeOffset(const OFFSET_INITIALIZER& offsetInitializer, size_t index, size_t byteOffset)
112 {
113  offsetInitializer.initializeOffset(index, byteOffset);
114 }
115 
116 // overload for DummyOffsetInitializer which does nothing
117 inline void initializeOffset(const DummyOffsetInitializer&, size_t, size_t)
118 {}
119 
120 // dummy offset checker used for arrays which don't need to check offsets.
121 struct DummyOffsetChecker
122 {};
123 
124 // helper function to call checkOffset on an offset checker
125 template <typename OFFSET_CHECKER>
126 void checkOffset(const OFFSET_CHECKER& offsetChecker, size_t index, size_t byteOffset)
127 {
128  offsetChecker.checkOffset(index, byteOffset);
129 }
130 
131 // overload for DummyOffsetChecker which does nothing
132 inline void checkOffset(const DummyOffsetChecker&, size_t, size_t)
133 {}

140 enum ArrayType
141 {
142  NORMAL,
143  IMPLICIT,
144  ALIGNED,
145  AUTO,
146  ALIGNED_AUTO
147 };
148 
154 template <typename RAW_ARRAY, typename ARRAY_TRAITS, ArrayType ARRAY_TYPE,
155  typename OFFSET_CHECKER = detail::DummyOffsetChecker,
156  typename OFFSET_INITIALIZER = detail::DummyOffsetInitializer>
157 class Array
158 {
159 public:
161  using RawArray = RAW_ARRAY;
162 
164  using ArrayTraits = ARRAY_TRAITS;
165 
167  using allocator_type = typename RawArray::allocator_type;
168 
175  explicit Array(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, const allocator_type& allocator = allocator_type()) :
176  m_rawArray(allocator), m_arrayTraits(arrayTraits), m_packedArrayTraits(m_arrayTraits)
177  {}
178 
185  Array(const RAW_ARRAY& rawArray, const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits) :
186  m_rawArray(rawArray), m_arrayTraits(arrayTraits), m_packedArrayTraits(m_arrayTraits)
187  {}
188 
195  Array(RAW_ARRAY&& rawArray, const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits) :
196  m_rawArray(std::move(rawArray)), m_arrayTraits(arrayTraits), m_packedArrayTraits(m_arrayTraits)
197  {}
198 
204  Array(const Array& other)
205  : m_rawArray(other.m_rawArray), m_arrayTraits(other.m_arrayTraits),
206  m_packedArrayTraits(other.m_packedArrayTraits)
207  {
208  if (other.m_packingContextNode)
209  createContext();
210  }
211 
219  Array& operator=(const Array& other)
220  {
221  m_rawArray = other.m_rawArray;
222  m_arrayTraits = other.m_arrayTraits;
223  m_packedArrayTraits = other.m_packedArrayTraits;
224 
225  if (other.m_packingContextNode)
226  createContext();
227 
228  return *this;
229  }
230 
235  ~Array() = default;
236 
237  Array(Array&& other) = default;
238  Array& operator=(Array&& other) = default;
249  Array(::zserio::PropagateAllocatorT,
250  const Array& other, const allocator_type& allocator) :
251  m_rawArray(::zserio::allocatorPropagatingCopy(other.m_rawArray, allocator)),
252  m_arrayTraits(other.m_arrayTraits), m_packedArrayTraits(other.m_packedArrayTraits)
253  {
254  if (other.m_packingContextNode)
255  createContext();
256  }
257 
263  const RawArray& getRawArray() const
264  {
265  return m_rawArray;
266  }
267 
273  RawArray& getRawArray()
274  {
275  return m_rawArray;
276  }
277 
283  bool operator==(const Array& other) const
284  {
285  return m_rawArray == other.m_rawArray;
286  }
287 
293  uint32_t hashCode() const
294  {
295  return calcHashCode(HASH_SEED, m_rawArray);
296  }
297 
303  template <typename ELEMENT_INITIALIZER>
304  void initializeElements(const ELEMENT_INITIALIZER& elementInitializer)
305  {
306  size_t index = 0;
307  for (auto&& element : m_rawArray)
308  {
309  elementInitializer.initialize(element, index);
310  index++;
311  }
312  }
313 
321  size_t bitSizeOf(size_t bitPosition) const
322  {
323  size_t endBitPosition = bitPosition;
324 
325  const size_t size = m_rawArray.size();
326  if (ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::AUTO || ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED_AUTO)
327  endBitPosition += zserio::bitSizeOfVarSize(convertSizeToUInt32(size));
328 
329  if (ARRAY_TRAITS::IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT && size > 0)
330  {
331  const size_t elementBitSize = detail::arrayTraitsConstBitSizeOf(m_arrayTraits);
332  if (ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED || ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED_AUTO)
333  {
334  endBitPosition = alignTo(8, endBitPosition);
335  endBitPosition += elementBitSize + (size - 1) * alignTo(8, elementBitSize);
336  }
337  else
338  {
339  endBitPosition += size * elementBitSize;
340  }
341  }
342  else
343  {
344  for (size_t index = 0; index < size; ++index)
345  {
346  if (ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED || ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED_AUTO)
347  endBitPosition = alignTo(8, endBitPosition);
348  endBitPosition += m_arrayTraits.bitSizeOf(endBitPosition, m_rawArray.at(index));
349  }
350  }
351 
352  return endBitPosition - bitPosition;
353  }
354 
362  size_t bitSizeOfPacked(size_t bitPosition) const
363  {
364  static_assert(ARRAY_TYPE != ArrayType::IMPLICIT, "Implicit array cannot be packed!");
365 
366  size_t endBitPosition = bitPosition;
367 
368  const size_t size = m_rawArray.size();
369  if (ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::AUTO || ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED_AUTO)
370  endBitPosition += zserio::bitSizeOfVarSize(convertSizeToUInt32(size));
371 
372  if (size > 0)
373  {
374  auto& contextNode = getPackingContextNode();
375  for (size_t index = 0; index < size; ++index)
376  m_packedArrayTraits.initContext(contextNode, m_rawArray.at(index));
377  endBitPosition += bitSizeOfDescriptor(contextNode, endBitPosition);
378 
379  for (size_t index = 0; index < size; ++index)
380  {
381  if (ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED || ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED_AUTO)
382  endBitPosition = alignTo(8, endBitPosition);
383  endBitPosition += m_packedArrayTraits.bitSizeOf(contextNode, endBitPosition,
384  m_rawArray.at(index));
385  }
386  }
387 
388  return endBitPosition - bitPosition;
389  }
390 
399  size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, const OFFSET_INITIALIZER& offsetInitializer)
400  {
401  size_t endBitPosition = bitPosition;
402 
403  const size_t size = m_rawArray.size();
404  if (ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::AUTO || ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED_AUTO)
405  endBitPosition += zserio::bitSizeOfVarSize(convertSizeToUInt32(size));
406 
407  for (size_t index = 0; index < size; ++index)
408  {
409  if (ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED || ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED_AUTO)
410  {
411  endBitPosition = alignTo(8, endBitPosition);
412  detail::initializeOffset(offsetInitializer, index, bitsToBytes(endBitPosition));
413  }
414  endBitPosition = m_arrayTraits.initializeOffsets(endBitPosition, m_rawArray.at(index));
415  }
416 
417  return endBitPosition;
418  }
419 
428  size_t initializeOffsetsPacked(size_t bitPosition, const OFFSET_INITIALIZER& offsetInitializer)
429  {
430  static_assert(ARRAY_TYPE != ArrayType::IMPLICIT, "Implicit array cannot be packed!");
431 
432  size_t endBitPosition = bitPosition;
433 
434  const size_t size = m_rawArray.size();
435  if (ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::AUTO || ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED_AUTO)
436  endBitPosition += zserio::bitSizeOfVarSize(convertSizeToUInt32(size));
437 
438  if (size > 0)
439  {
440  auto& contextNode = getPackingContextNode();
441  for (size_t index = 0; index < size; ++index)
442  m_packedArrayTraits.initContext(contextNode, m_rawArray.at(index));
443  endBitPosition += bitSizeOfDescriptor(contextNode, endBitPosition);
444 
445  for (size_t index = 0; index < size; ++index)
446  {
447  if (ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED || ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED_AUTO)
448  {
449  endBitPosition = alignTo(8, endBitPosition);
450  detail::initializeOffset(offsetInitializer, index, bitsToBytes(endBitPosition));
451  }
452  endBitPosition = m_packedArrayTraits.initializeOffsets(
453  contextNode, endBitPosition, m_rawArray.at(index));
454  }
455  }
456 
457  return endBitPosition;
458  }
459 
470  void read(BitStreamReader& in, size_t arrayLength,
471  const detail::ElementFactory<ARRAY_TRAITS>& elementFactory, const OFFSET_CHECKER& offsetChecker)
472  {
473  static_assert(ARRAY_TYPE != ArrayType::IMPLICIT || ARRAY_TRAITS::IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT,
474  "Implicit array elements must have constant bit size!");
475 
476  size_t readSize = arrayLength;
477  if (ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::IMPLICIT)
478  {
479  const size_t remainingBits = in.getBufferBitSize() - in.getBitPosition();
480  readSize = remainingBits / detail::arrayTraitsConstBitSizeOf(m_arrayTraits);
481  }
482  else if (ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::AUTO || ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED_AUTO)
483  {
484  readSize = in.readVarSize();
485  }
486 
487  m_rawArray.clear();
488  m_rawArray.reserve(readSize);
489  for (size_t index = 0; index < readSize; ++index)
490  {
491  if (ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED || ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED_AUTO)
492  {
493  in.alignTo(8);
494  detail::checkOffset(offsetChecker, index, bitsToBytes(in.getBitPosition()));
495  }
496  detail::arrayTraitsRead(m_rawArray, m_arrayTraits, elementFactory, in, index);
497  }
498  }
499 
510  void readPacked(BitStreamReader& in, size_t arrayLength,
511  const detail::ElementFactory<ARRAY_TRAITS>& elementFactory, const OFFSET_CHECKER& offsetChecker)
512  {
513  static_assert(ARRAY_TYPE != ArrayType::IMPLICIT, "Implicit array cannot be packed!");
514 
515  size_t readSize = arrayLength;
516  if (ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::AUTO || ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED_AUTO)
517  readSize = in.readVarSize();
518 
519  m_rawArray.clear();
520 
521  if (readSize > 0)
522  {
523  m_rawArray.reserve(readSize);
524 
525  auto& contextNode = getPackingContextNode();
526  readDescriptor(contextNode, in);
527 
528  for (size_t index = 0; index < readSize; ++index)
529  {
530  if (ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED || ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED_AUTO)
531  {
532  in.alignTo(8);
533  detail::checkOffset(offsetChecker, index, bitsToBytes(in.getBitPosition()));
534  }
535  detail::packedArrayTraitsRead(m_rawArray, m_packedArrayTraits, elementFactory,
536  contextNode, in, index);
537  }
538  }
539  }
540 
547  void write(BitStreamWriter& out, const OFFSET_CHECKER& offsetChecker)
548  {
549  const size_t size = m_rawArray.size();
550  if (ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::AUTO || ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED_AUTO)
551  out.writeVarSize(convertSizeToUInt32(size));
552 
553  for (size_t index = 0; index < size; ++index)
554  {
555  if (ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED || ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED_AUTO)
556  {
557  out.alignTo(8);
558  detail::checkOffset(offsetChecker, index, bitsToBytes(out.getBitPosition()));
559  }
560  m_arrayTraits.write(out, m_rawArray.at(index));
561  }
562  }
563 
570  void writePacked(BitStreamWriter& out, const OFFSET_CHECKER& offsetChecker)
571  {
572  static_assert(ARRAY_TYPE != ArrayType::IMPLICIT, "Implicit array cannot be packed!");
573 
574  const size_t size = m_rawArray.size();
575  if (ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::AUTO || ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED_AUTO)
576  out.writeVarSize(convertSizeToUInt32(size));
577 
578  if (size > 0)
579  {
580  auto& contextNode = getPackingContextNode();
581  for (size_t index = 0; index < size; ++index)
582  m_packedArrayTraits.initContext(contextNode, m_rawArray.at(index));
583  writeDescriptor(contextNode, out);
584 
585  for (size_t index = 0; index < size; ++index)
586  {
587  if (ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED || ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::ALIGNED_AUTO)
588  {
589  out.alignTo(8);
590  detail::checkOffset(offsetChecker, index, bitsToBytes(out.getBitPosition()));
591  }
592  m_packedArrayTraits.write(contextNode, out, m_rawArray.at(index));
593  }
594  }
595  }

623  }

635  ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::IMPLICIT, "Allowed only for auto / implicit arrays!");
636  read(in, 0, detail::DummyElementFactory(), detail::DummyOffsetChecker());
637  }

650  ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::IMPLICIT, "Allowed only for auto / implicit arrays!");
651  read(in, 0, detail::DummyElementFactory(), offsetChecker);
652  }

682  ARRAY_TYPE == ArrayType::IMPLICIT, "Allowed only for auto / implicit arrays!");

854 
855 private:
856  // RebindAlloc is used here to prevent multiple instantiations of the PackingContextNode template
857  using PackingContextNodeType = BasicPackingContextNode<RebindAlloc<allocator_type, uint8_t>>;
858 
859  PackingContextNodeType& getPackingContextNode() const
860  {
861  if (!m_packingContextNode) // lazy init
862  createContext();
863  else
864  resetContext(*m_packingContextNode);
865 
866  return *m_packingContextNode;
867  }
868 
869  void createContext() const
870  {
871  m_packingContextNode = allocate_unique<PackingContextNodeType>(
872  m_rawArray.get_allocator(), m_rawArray.get_allocator());
873  m_packedArrayTraits.createContext(*m_packingContextNode);
874  }
875 
876  static void resetContext(PackingContextNodeType& contextNode)
877  {
878  if (contextNode.hasContext())
879  {
880  contextNode.getContext().reset();
881  }
882  else
883  {
884  for (auto& childNode : contextNode.getChildren())
885  resetContext(childNode);
886  }
887  }
888 
889  static size_t bitSizeOfDescriptor(PackingContextNodeType& contextNode, size_t bitPosition)
890  {
891  size_t endBitPosition = bitPosition;
892 
893  if (contextNode.hasContext())
894  {
895  endBitPosition += contextNode.getContext().bitSizeOfDescriptor();
896  }
897  else
898  {
899  for (auto& childNode : contextNode.getChildren())
900  endBitPosition += bitSizeOfDescriptor(childNode, endBitPosition);
901  }
902 
903  return endBitPosition - bitPosition;
904  }
905 
906  static void readDescriptor(PackingContextNodeType& contextNode, BitStreamReader& in)
907  {
908  if (contextNode.hasContext())
909  {
910  contextNode.getContext().readDescriptor(in);
911  }
912  else
913  {
914  for (auto& childNode : contextNode.getChildren())
915  readDescriptor(childNode, in);
916  }
917  }
918 
919  static void writeDescriptor(PackingContextNodeType& contextNode, BitStreamWriter& out)
920  {
921  if (contextNode.hasContext())
922  {
923  contextNode.getContext().writeDescriptor(out);
924  }
925  else
926  {
927  for (auto& childNode : contextNode.getChildren())
928  writeDescriptor(childNode, out);
929  }
930  }
931 
932  RawArray m_rawArray;
933  ARRAY_TRAITS m_arrayTraits;
934  PackedArrayTraits<ARRAY_TRAITS> m_packedArrayTraits;
935  // mutable context is ok since it's just a cache and we need to keep bitSizeOfPacked method const
936  mutable unique_ptr<PackingContextNodeType,
937  RebindAlloc<allocator_type, PackingContextNodeType>> m_packingContextNode;
938 };
939 
944 template <typename ARRAY, typename RAW_ARRAY, typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
945 ARRAY createOptionalArray(RAW_ARRAY&& rawArray, const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits)
946 {
947  return ARRAY(std::forward<RAW_ARRAY>(rawArray), arrayTraits);
948 }
949 
953 template <typename ARRAY, typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
954 NullOptType createOptionalArray(NullOptType, const ARRAY_TRAITS&)
955 {
956  return NullOpt;
957 }
958 
959 } // namespace zserio
960 
961 #endif // ZSERIO_ARRAY_H_INC
